title: Coverlet Fragment, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton, wool
Technique: plain compound cloth (overshot)
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 57 x 32 cm (22 7/16 x 12 5/8 in.)
description: Traditional geometrical decoration with squares in broad framework with various fillings. In deep blue, bright rust, and blue-green wool pattern wefts used in bands of these colors on undyed cotton ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Coverlet Fragment, early 19th century.Medium: cotton, wool
Technique: plain compound cloth (overshot). 1953-218-42.
